GapFillDragDrop.Title: can and can’t
GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Drag the phrases to the correct blanks to complete the dialogue.

Content.Question:
1. A: Greg, how can I get to the airport?
2. B: That’s easy. You can take an airport bus.
3. A: That takes a long time. Can I go by train?
4. B: No, you can’t. There are no trains.
5. A: I can go by taxi.
6. B: Yes, but it costs a lot. What time can you finish work tomorrow?
7. A: At four, I think. Why? Can you take me in your car?
8. B: Yes, okay. And you can buy me a coffee!
